nodes.description: 印度为2月14日克什米尔恐袭中牺牲的40名CRPF人员举行哀悼
nodes.support_text: India is mourning the death of 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) personnel who were killed in a Pulwama Terror Attacks in Kashmir on February 14.

nodes.description: 印度民众自发为烈士家属捐款并表达哀悼
nodes.support_text: As Indians are donating money and helping the martyrs’ families

nodes.description: 阿杰·德格万宣布停止在巴基斯坦上映电影《Total Dhamaal》
nodes.support_text: After Ajay Devgn decided to not release ‘Total Dhamaal’ in Pakistan

nodes.description: 其他印度影人宣布停止与巴基斯坦艺术家合作
nodes.support_text: now Salman Khan’s upcoming production ‘Notebook’ and Shahid Kapoor‘s next ‘Kabir Singh’ won’t release in Pakistan either.

nodes.description: 萨姆·汗的《Notebook》和沙伊德·卡普尔的《Kabir Singh》决定不登陆巴基斯坦市场
nodes.support_text: now Salman Khan’s upcoming production ‘Notebook’ and Shahid Kapoor‘s next ‘Kabir Singh’ won’t release in Pakistan either.

edges.support_text: As Indians are donating money and helping the martyrs’ families
After Ajay Devgn decided to not release ‘Total Dhamaal’ in Pakistan
now Salman Khan’s upcoming production ‘Notebook’ and Shahid Kapoor‘s next ‘Kabir Singh’ won’t release in Pakistan either.
